subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The off-season shooting death of Ryan Francis in his home state, Louisiana, dealt an emotional blow to the team and left the Trojans without one of the best young point guards in the Pac-10.
snippet: The off-season shooting death of Ryan Francis in his home state, Louisiana, dealt an emotional blow to the team and left the Trojans without one of the best young point guards in the Pac-10.
